channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Key Smartphones Of 2025, From iPhone Air To Galaxy Z TriFold, Predict The Year Ahead
item.description: From ultra-thin designs to experimental foldables, 2025’s smartphone launches show where the industry is heading next.

item.title: 4 Predictions That Won’t Come True In 2026
item.description: You're going to see a lot of stories in 2026 claiming soon-to-be-achieved science and tech advances. Here are the ones just ain't going to happen.

item.title: The ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Thor Trailer Is Here, Watch It Now
item.description: Thor gets an official Avengers: Doomsday trailer, but with a significant change from the leaked version. What's different?

item.title: ‘Heated Rivalry’ Is Disqualified From The Emmys, And Season 2 May Be Too
item.description: Despite being one of the highest-rated shows of the year, Heated Rivalry is disqualified from the Emmys this year. Why?

item.title: Bad News About ‘Stranger Things’ Season 5 Finale Movie Tickets
item.description: Stranger Things' finale is airing in movie theaters tomorrow, but there is not great news if you are trying to hunt down tickets right now.

item.title: Warning labels

item.title: “It’s a bargain”

item.title: Your best work
